page.title: 14PARISH COUNCIL
page.content: { The Parish Council}meets once a month on the first or second Monday at the Village Hall in Birch. There are seven members including the Chairwoman, Mrs. Crowe. They cover an area from the Angel Inn at Heckford Bridge to the Hare and Hounds in Layer Breton. You have to be 18 to become a member and you can retire when you like. At the moment the parish council are trying to get a pavement down the main road from the village to the school. This is because the road is narrow and dangerous for pedestrians to use.
